items.style rules: @media screen { #_id_ > .puiresp { display:grid; grid-template-rows:73px 756px auto; grid-template-columns:auto; grid-column-gap:3px; grid-row-gap:3px; } #_id_ > .puiresp > div:nth-of-type(1) { grid-row-end:span 1; } }

items.column headings: ID ,PID,Quantity,Unit Cost,Inventory Status,Inventory ID,Date Received,Submit Changes,delete_forever

items.html: This is an example application. In order to preserve the example database, we are restricting certain functionalities. If you have any questions on how to implement this functionality, please contact us directly.
Contact Us    open_in_new

items.tool tip: Delete record permanently. Cannot be undone.
